cells.data:
-- fileUTI :: FilePath -> String
on fileUTI(fp)
    set {uti, e} to (current application's ¬
        NSWorkspace's sharedWorkspace()'s ¬
        typeOfFile:fp |error|:(reference)) as list
    if uti is missing value then
        e's localizedDescription() as text
    else
        uti as text
    end if
end fileUTI
